message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's a great opportunity for you to get your hands on something truly unique. I'm willing to sell it to you for $180.

Hi Alice, thank you for offering me the product. I appreciate the uniqueness of the item, but I believe we can find a price closer to my budget. I would like to propose a price of $120 for the product.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand that $120 is a bit lower than I was hoping for, but I'm willing to compromise. I'd like to counteroffer at $160. I think this is a fair price considering the unique features of the product.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Alice. I appreciate the effort to reach a compromise. I would like to counterpropose a price of $140 for the product. I hope this aligns better with our respective positions.

I appreciate your persistence, Bob! I'm still not willing to go as low as $140, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'd like to counteroffer at $152. I think this is a fair price considering the value the product brings to the table.

Thank you for your latest proposal, Alice. I've been considering the value of the product and I would like to counteroffer at $148 for the product. I believe this price reflects a fair compromise between our positions.

I'm getting close to accepting your offer, Bob! I'm willing to meet you at $150, but I'm still not willing to go any lower. I think this is a fair price considering the value the product brings to the table.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Considering the product's value and my budget constraints, I would like to counteroffer at $145 for the product. I hope this aligns better with our discussion.

I'm getting close to accepting your offer, Bob! I'm willing to meet you at $149, but I'm still not willing to go any lower. I think this is a fair price considering the value the product brings to the table.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I've carefully considered the product's value and my budget, and I would like to counteroffer at $147 for the product. I hope this aligns well with your expectations.
